name: TESTPingOne - Sign On and Password Reset
description: Used to create authentication flows and includes the ability for users to reset or recover their passwords.

settings.csp: worker-src 'self' blob:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com https://devsdk.singularkey.com http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';

customHTML.value:
Enter New Password

If you have an active account with a valid email address, you will receive an email with a recovery code which you may enter here, along with a new password. If you do not have an account or email, please contact your administrator to recover your password.

Change Password

Your password must be changed. Please create a new one.

Password Reset

Enter your username, and we'll send password reset instructions to your email address.
